name: Through The Roots
description:
You saw the light for the first time in your existence...

On one hand it is beautiful, but on the other it showed all the creatures crawling in the root kingdom. 

Get rid of them and reach the exit before the torch expires. Are you brave enough to try?

The red bar in the bottom shows how much time you have, for the fire to die.

You move with W, A, S, D keys, and attack with LBM (left mouse button).

See if you are the worthy one to bring the flame to the king of the roots!
